sentence.text: IN 1981 ex-police officer and Playboy bunny girl Lawrencia ` Bambi " Bembeneck was jailed for life for the murder of her husband 's ex-wife at home in Milwaukee .
Aaron Hayes , Daniel Williams and John Hughes were jailed for 15 months for conspiracy to rob and possessing an imitation firearm .
A YOUNG Belfast man has been jailed for two years for the manslaughter of a Galway barman while on holiday in Salthill last summer .
Courtney was jailed for seven years on November 30 following his conviction for two rapes and two indecent assaults .
A London born terrorist has today been jailed for six months in Amsterdam on arms offences .
Martin Richmond and a friend were jailed after their visas were founds to be forged .
A BUSINESSMAN has been jailed for 18 months for receiving thousands of pounds worth of stolen goods .
Eddie Browning was jailed for life for the murder of Marie Wilkes from Worcester in 1988 .
An eighteen year old arsonist has been gaoled for eight years for starting a house fire in which a four year old girl lost her hand .
SCOTLAND 'S senior judge gave warning yesterday of severe sentences on bank raiders as he jailed a man for five years .
Taking into account Ferguson 's health , age , and the fact he had not previously been in prison , he jailed him for 18 months .
Baroness Susan De Stempel was jailed in 1990 for a crime described as cruel and ruthless .
Murray Stewart was jailed in the summer for attempting a £40m computer fraud .

Concern over the trade in wild plants has been heightened by the activities of Henry Azadehdel , who was jailed in Britain this year for smuggling orchids taken from the wild and imported without the proper permits .
Two Darlington men were jailed for four months by magistrates yesterday for their part in an attempted burglary of a terraced house in the town .
A GANG involved in theft attacks on telephone kiosks has been jailed by Liverpool Crown Court .
A former sheriff of Nottingham has been jailed for fraud .
His attacker , 33-year-old Peter Sigsworth , was jailed for three years .
A man has been jailed for life for strangling his estranged wife , after finding a love letter she had written to another man .
A DRINK-DRIVER was jailed for just four months yesterday for mowing down a nine-year-old girl .
